TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NetNamedPipeSecurityMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether transport-level security is used with named pipes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this enumeration to specify whether transport-level security is used with named pipes when using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>. The default value is Transport.
## Examples [!code-cs[S_UENetNamedPipeSecurity#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ne_1_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Indicates no security is used with the named pipe transport.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode Transport = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Indicates that transport-level security is used with the named pipe transport.
